title: Playlearn Red Pedal Go Vehicle Balance Toy Ride On Toy Prop 4 Wheels Stepper- 6Pcs Juggling Balls for Helps Stress Relief
features: EXCITING ACTIVE PLAY & STRESS RELIEF: Encourage movement and relaxation with a fun ride-on and a soothing sensory toy. The Red Pedal Go Fun Wheels promote coordination, while the Juggling Balls Stress Ball offers a calming fidget experience. A perfect mix of activity and relaxation for all ages.

ENHANCES MOTOR SKILLS & FOCUS: Pedal and balance with the Red Pedal Go Fun Wheels to build coordination, agility, and strength. Meanwhile, the Puffer Stress Ball helps improve grip and fine motor skills, making it a great tool for stress relief and sensory play.

PERFECT SIZE FOR ALL AGES: The Red Pedal Go Fun Wheels measures L35cm x W33cm x H13cm, with pedals sized L25cm x W10cm, ideal for ages 7+. The Puffer Stress Ball measures 8cm in diameter, making it perfect for and adults seeking a fun and calming tactile experience.

INDOOR & OUTDOOR FUN: Enjoy active play anywhere with the Red Pedal Go Fun Wheels, designed for both indoor and outdoor use. The Juggling Ball Stress Ball is a great companion at home, school, or on the go, offering relaxation and sensory stimulation anytime, anywhere.

ENCOURAGES ACTIVE & MINDFUL PLAY: Get moving with an exciting ride while also promoting relaxation with a stress-relieving fidget toy. The Red Pedal Go Fun Wheels keep them engaged physically, while the Puffer Stress Ball helps them unwind and refocus during quiet moments.
description: Product description Pedal Go Fun Wheels Stepper Pedal Vehicle & Bean Bag Juggling Balls Experience endless fun and physical activity with this Pedal Go Fun Wheels Stepper Pedal Vehicle, designed for to enjoy an exciting and engaging ride every time they play. This Stepper Pedal Vehicle promotes balance, coordination, and strength while offering a thrilling way to move around and explore new adventures. Bean Bag Juggling Balls Bring the outdoors in without losing any of the comfort! These lovely Bean Bag Juggling Balls provide an exciting way to develop coordination and motor skills in a fun way. Their compact 5cm size ensures they fit comfortably in small hands, making them suitable for children and adults alike. The plastic bean filling ensures a balanced weight, making them ideal for smooth and controlled throws. Whether used indoors or outdoors, these juggling balls provide endless fun while developing essential hand-eye coordination skills. Features: Pedal Go Fun Wheels Stepper Pedal Vehicle Fully assembled and ready to use Smooth stepper motion for nonstop active fun Sturdy plastic foot platforms ensure safe riding Four wheels provide a stable and smooth ride Enhances balance, coordination, and motor skills Juggling Balls Soft, squidgy texture for easy grip and control Durable stitched textile exterior for longevity Plastic bean filling ensures balanced weight Compact 5cm size, ideal for small hands Bright, vibrant colors enhance visibility Smooth, rounded shape for consistent throws Specifications: Juggling Ball Pack Size: Pack of 6 Size: 5cm Age: Suitable for age 3 years+ Usage: Sensory Play Safety Warning No Safety Warning
